author: Lee Seiu Kin J:
casename: Merrill Lynch Pierce, Fenner & Smith Inc v Prem Ramchand Harjani and Another
counsel: Hri Kumar Nair SC and James Low (Drew & Napier LLC) for the plaintiff; Denis Tan (Toh Tan LLP) for the first defendant; Anthony Lee Hwee Khiam, Pua Lee Siang and Shermaine Lim (Bih Li & Lee) for the second defendant
tags-parsed: Arbitration/Stay of court proceedings/Mandatory stay under International Arbitration Act (Cap 143A, 2002 Rev Ed)/Express terms prohibited set-off from liability/Whether customer entitled to set off against its liability
